about_the_game:
DEAR [email recipient], YOU ARE FORMALLY INVITED TO BE NEXT * the next PLAY OF OUR LATEST PINECONE PRODUCT!

ITS A BENEFIT FOR MY ENTERTAINMENT AND YOUR WALLET AND MY WALLET! PLAY NOW! THE GAME IS FREE! ITS SHORT! IT'S A STEAM GAME!
-------------------------------------------------

Fingernail Floss is a short visual novel where you and your friends must overcome deadly trials in a twisted death game. Experience the strange world and characters of Fingernail Floss! This game features lore! Save states! Loading save states! Obstacles the cast of characters must overcome! Fingernail Floss is a story-focused game that lets you truly experience what it's like to be low-budget test subjects!

-------------------------------------------------
THE GAME FEATURES:

- ABOUT AN HOUR OF FUN!

- AN ENDING!

- MSPAINT GALORE!

- (THIS TEST DOES NOT PROVIDE FREE DENTAL!)



(CONTENT WARNING: This game features themes of Death, Gore, Depression, Suicide & Violence!)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains themes of Death, gore, suicide, depression, and violence!

name: Fingernail Floss
short_description: A short spooky-fun visual novel where you are a special guest for a special test! Is death a game to you? Do you like color schemes that involve the color black? EXPERIENCE FINGERNAIL FLOSS! !
